/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. 

The street itself is a hive of activity with several cars and buses navigating their way. A few pedestrians can be seen as well, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow.
